Package ojvm.machine

Class Summary
ControlUnit A control unit for the machine that allows convenient access to the internals of the machine and the global operations that use and affect the state of the machine.
 

Exception Summary
LocalVarsE Exceptions related to the local vars
OperandStackE Exceptions related to the operand stack operations
ThreadHaltE Exception thrown when a thread has no more instructions to execute
VMStackE Exception thrown when attempting to pop from an empty Java stack.
